name: Reach the Branch (Giraffe)
description:
Giraffes and long necks are cool.

That's why you want to keep completing minigames and let a tremendously cool giraffe reach the branch, eat and conquer the universe (this last bit only in the sequel though).

With a sublime soundtrack, stunning audio effects and a state of the art GDScript code base (that means yes, it's full of unnecessary duplicated code), this game was made for the Trijam 182 in way more than 3 hours. And we're justified: we were completely drunk when entered the jam and read 33 hours instead of 3.

----------------------

Made in 3+ hours using Godot Engine. 

Sfx made with Jsfxr.

----------------------

Art 🎨 - @malvagio_gionni

Sfx 🔊 - @b_cenz

Code 💻 - A prehistorical dinosaur
